subject: FROM THE DESK OF UNITE BANK OF
body:
FROM THE DESK OF UNITE BANK OF AFRICA MANAGEMENT
COTONOU BENIN REPUBLIC
DIRECTOR FOREIGN REMIT DEPT
UBA BANK PLC AFRICA
ATTENTION: DEAR BENEFICIARY,
THIS IS TO ACKNOWLEDGE THE RECEIPT OF YOUR MAIL,I AM ONLY TAKING
ADVANTAGE OF THE DISMISSED TOP OFFICIALS SOME OF THEM ARE ON
COMPULSORY VACATION THIS HAS ACCORD ME GOLDEN OPPORTUNITY TO SERVE YOU
AND YOU WILL BE PROUD IF YOU COMPLY WITH ME.
SELF, ONE OF MY COLLEAGUE AND THE DIRECTOR OF INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE
DEPARTMENT HAVE AGREED TO ASSIST YOU BASED ON THE FOLLOWING CONDITION
THAT 
YOU MUST KEEP THIS AGREEMENT VERY SECRET NO ONE HERE IN AFRICA
MUST KNOW ABOUT THIS DEAL AND MUST BE PREPARED TO GIVE US 10% OF THE
TOTAL SUM AS SOON AS YOUR ACCOUNT IS CREDITED
.
WE HAVE COMPLETED OUR FINAL VERIFICATION ON YOUR FILE AND CONFIRMED
THE SAME FOR SWIFT TRANSFER TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT. NOTE THAT PAYMENT
CONFIRMATION BY SWIFT IS WITHIN 72HRS CONFIRMATION AND
 YOU ARE
REQUIRED TO PAY US$250.00 DOLLARS REPRESENTING STATUTORY TRANSFER
CLEARING/DOCUMENTATION VALIDATION CHARGES.
PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS CHARGE IS NOT DEDUCTIBLE FROM THE PRINCIPAL
AMOUNT AND IT YOUR OWN RESPONSIBILITY TO PAY IT OFF FOR ACTUALIZATION
OF THE TRANSACTION,
THE ACCOUNTANT LEGAL DEPARTMENT OFFICER NAME IS BELLOW:
RECEIVER,S NAME:SARKI   AKANTA
CITY:COTONOU
COUNTRY: COTONOU BENIN REPUBLIC
AMOUNT SEND:$250.00USD
SENDER'S NAME:::::::::::::::::::::
SENDER'S COUNTRY NAME::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::;
REFERENCE  NUMBER:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
USE RIA OR WORLD REMIT  MONEY TRANSFER TO  COTONOU BENIN REPUBLIC  FOR
SENDING OF THE CHARGE TO THE LEGAL UNIT
. ON CONFIRMATION OF PAYMENT OF
THESE CHARGES, YOUR ACCOUNT WILL BE CREDITED VIA SWIFT WITHIN 72HRS.
BE FINALLY ADVICE THAT WE WILL SEND TO YOU THE PAYMENT TRANSFER
DETAILS OF SWIFT WIRE TRANSFER REPORT AS SOON THE TRANSFER HAS BEEN
COMPLETED BUT PENDING WHEN YOU WILL SEND TO US THE CHARGES RIA OR
WORLD REMIT REFERENCE NUMBERS.
DR. GRACE FAVOUR
IN CASE IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTION PLEASE REVERT BACK TO US. CHIEF
ENGINEER IN THE COMPUTER/TELEX DEPARTMENT
------------------------------ -------------------------
------------------------------ ----------------
------------------------------ -
We are neither just an off shore neither bank nor are we only on
shore........WE ARE BOTH; we touch base at every nook and cranny of
the country. That is why you’ll always find and Bank of Africa branch
up North, down South, East and West. Our amiable record is borne out
of the bank's philosophy of client’s satisfaction; we offer our
clients the following services: Traditional Banking services,
Corporate Finance Services, Telebanking Services, Visible & Invisible
Transaction Services, Exports Desk Services and Public Sectors
Services. We are totally devoted to you......This transmission has
been issued by Group Bank Of Africa ''BOA'' for the information of the
addressee only and should not be reproduced and / or distributed to
any other person. To its completeness

subject: Re: FROM THE DESK OF UNITE BANK OF
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I received your email regarding the transfer of funds. However, I must admit that I found it quite difficult to understand due to the formatting and language used.

From what I could gather, it seems you are asking for a payment of US dollars for statutory transfer clearing validation charges. Could you please clarify this? Also, could you provide more information about the total sum that is supposed to be transferred?

I would appreciate if you could resend the information in a clearer format.

Best wishes,
Jeanne
